app.containers.Account.Create.subHeader: Name your account anything you like, and give it a valid password.
app.containers.HomePage.blurbFees: All the while paying no fees whatsoever, and enjoying the world's most secure accounts.

app.containers.HomePage.headerTopLeft: TheCoin is backed by the S&P500. Annual return of 9.8% over the last 90 years Fight inflation and maintain purchasing power.
app.containers.NotFoundPage.headerTopCen: Creating an account with TheCoin WILL help stop climate change.
app.containers.NotFoundPage.headerTopRig: You get 90% of the dividends. We keep 10% and put it towards fighting climate change: Tree planting.
app.containers.NotFoundPage.subscribe: Subscribe to learn how you can help fight climate change with TheCoin. Subscribe to our mailing list today.
